text: Andrée Geulen-Herscovici (6 September 1921 – 31 May 2022) was a Belgian teacher. She was a member of the Belgian Resistance during the German occupation of Belgium during World War II. She was a member of the Comité de Défense des Juifs group. She took part in the rescue of almost 1,000 Jewish childrenMelissa Weiss "Andrée Guelen Herscovici, Belgium", The International Raoul Wallenberg Foundation; accessed 22 March 2022. during the Holocaust. In 1989, Geulen was recognized with the honorific Righteous Among the Nations. Geulen turned 100 in September 2021. She died on 31 May 2022 in Ixelles, Belgium. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Belgian educators Category:Belgian people of World War II Category:Belgian centenarians Category:People from Brussels Category:Philanthropists Category:Righteous Among the Nations
